attributes.action: Complete Brexit, so we can deal with whole world on our terms without EU control
attributes.background: This is in accordance with the democratic vote in July 2016

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government and Parliament to take. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what action you would like the Government or Parliament to take.

You might also like to sign and share one of these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235185
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237632
